item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: Led controls software for self-balancing 2 DOF inverted pendulum, implementing real-time C++ firmware on ESP32 microcontroller with nested PID control algorithm in MATLAB Simulink.

item.title: Autonomous Robot
item.description:
• Led mechanical design within team of four, designed and fabricated self-driving all-terrain robot from scratch.

• Designed steering geometry in CAD, designed and soldered IR amplifier/detector circuit for use with STM32.

item.title: Machine Learning Competition
item.description: • Implemented self-driving and image recognition of a simulated vehicle using OpenCV, PyTorch, Keras, TensorFlow, and ROS in Python, as well as Git and Gazebo on Linux, placing fourth out of eighteen teams.
